resources.string: An error occurred while sending the message. Please check your network connectivity and outgoing server configuration.
To finish, open the message on your other device and enter the setup code.
An Autocrypt Setup Message securely shares your end-to-end setup with other devices.

This message contains all information to transfer your Autocrypt settings along with your secret key securely from your original device.
To set up your new device for Autocrypt, please follow the instructions that should be presented by your new device.
You can keep this message and use it as a backup for your secret key. If you want to do this, you should write down the password and store it securely.
Securely share end-to-end setup with other devices
The message will be sent to your address:
The account \"%s\" will be removed from Mail.
Show notifications only for messages from known contacts
The app couldn\'t find a browser to use for granting access to your account.
Authorization failed with the following error: %s
OAuth 2.0 is currently not supported with this provider.
We\'ll redirect you to your email provider to sign in. You need to grant the app access to your email account.
To view your password here, enable screen lock on this device.
The accent color of this account used in folder and account list
Set your default From, Bcc and signature
Encrypt drafts only if encryption is enabled
All drafts will be stored encrypted
May not be supported by some recipients
Only encrypted signatures will be displayed
Include the original message in your reply.
Set up alternate \'From\' addresses and signatures
Don\'t show notifications for messages belonging to an email chat
Mark a message as read when it is deleted
Mark a message as read when it is opened for viewing
Show a notification for messages I sent
Notify in status bar when mail arrives
Notify in status bar while mail is checked
Missing OpenPGP app - was it uninstalled?
The original message will appear above your reply.
Signatures will be removed from quoted messages
Remove messages when deleted on server
Upload messages to Sent folder after sending
What kind of account is this?
It is required to approve the configuration.

We received the configuration for your email server over a connection that isn\'t as secure as we\'d like. This means that there is a tiny chance that someone could have altered it. Could you please double-check the provided configuration to make sure it\'s as it should be?
To view your password here, enable screen lock on this device.
The app couldn\'t find a browser to use for granting access to your account.

The server presented an invalid SSL certificate. Sometimes, this is because of a server misconfiguration. Sometimes it is because someone is trying to attack you or your mail server. If you\'re not sure what\'s up, click Reject and contact the folks who manage your mail server.\n\n(%s)
Authorization failed with the following error: %s
OAuth 2.0 is currently not supported with this provider.
To use this email account with Mail, you need to sign in and grant the app access to your emails.
Email signature name can\'t be blank.
Max folders to check with push

Unable to authenticate. The server does not advertise the SASL EXTERNAL capability. This could be due to a problem with the client certificate (expired, unknown certificate authority) or some other configuration problem.

resources.string: You can\'t remove your only identity
Authentication failed for %s. Update your server settings.
Displayed while waiting for new messages
An error has occurred while trying to create a system notification for a new message. The reason is most likely a missing notification sound.\n\nTap to open notification settings.
Welcome to Erga Mail, the Android email client designed for enhanced security and seamless management of your email accounts.
Encrypting messages ensures they can be read by the recipient, and nobody else.
Toggle encryption by clicking this icon.
Encryption will only show up if supported by all recipients, and they must have sent you an email before.
Signatures may be displayed as \'signature.asc\' attachments in some clients.
Signatures may break when sent to mailing lists.
Encrypted messages always include a signature.
This does not encrypt the email, but verifies that it was sent from your key.
In this mode, your PGP key will be used to create a cryptographic signature of an unencrypted email.
Some of the selected recipients don\'t support this feature!
Some clients only support this format
The email is sent in PGP/INLINE format.\nThis should only be used for compatibility:
To be able to provide contact suggestions and to display contact names and photos, the app needs access to your contacts.
However, Android also allows you to hide the notification.
If you don\'t need instant notifications about new messages, you should disable Push and use Polling. Polling checks for new mail at regular intervals and does not need the notification.
When using Push, Mail maintains a connection to the mail server. Android requires displaying an ongoing notification while the app is active in the background. %s
Sleeping until background sync is allowed
Disable ringing, buzzing and flashing at night
Completely disable notifications during Quiet Time
Special characters are currently not supported!
A network connection is required for server search.
